citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:15 - 1:45 pm
on 09-AUG-17.
During that time, the inspector waited at the facility and called available phone number on file leaving a message.
